Package marcocipriani.openfocuser.manager.indi

Class INDIServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • laazotea.indi.server.AbstractINDIServer
      • laazotea.indi.server.DefaultINDIServer
        • marcocipriani.openfocuser.manager.indi.INDIServer

  • public class INDIServer
extends laazotea.indi.server.DefaultINDIServer
    A simple INDI Server that basically sends all messages from drivers and clients and vice versa, just performing basic checks of messages integrity. It allows to dynamically load / unload Java and native drivers.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    S. Alonso (Zerjillo) [zerjioi at ugr.es], marcocipriani01
